citation.title: Terahertz emission from laser-induced microplasma in ambient air

news.title: Generating broadband terahertz radiation from a microplasma in air
news.summary: ( University of Rochester ) Researchers have shown that a laser-generated microplasma in air can be used as a source of broadband terahertz radiation. In a paper published this week in Optica, they demonstrate that an approach for generating terahertz wave

news.title: Generating broadband terahertz radiation from a microplasma in air
news.summary: Researchers at the University of Rochester's Institute of Optics have shown that a laser-generated microplasma in air can be used as a source of broadband terahertz radiation.

news.title: Laser-induced plasma in air generates broadband terahertz radiation
news.summary: The source is potentially useful for broadband terahertz spectroscopy.

news.title: Generating Broadband Terahertz Radiation From a Microplasma in Air
news.summary: Researchers have shown that a laser-generated microplasma in air can be used as a source of broadband terahertz radiation, at much lower power lasers than until now.

news.title: Generating broadband terahertz radiation from a microplasma in air
news.summary: Researchers have shown that a laser-generated microplasma in air can be used as a source of broadband terahertz radiation. They demonstrate that an approach for generating terahertz waves using intense laser pulses in air can be done with much lower power
